attributes.action: Educate #Remain voters to understand the meaning of Democracy!
attributes.additional_details: It's absurd that the #VoteRemain voters keep slandering and abusing #VoteLeave voters for their intellectual capacity. We need to bring forward a system that educates these individuals to help them acknowledge how politics and democracy works, we can't live in a nation of sour grapes any longer!
attributes.background: Bring forward Politics as a subject taught in secondary schools so that in the next vote people actually acknowledge what Democracy means! Students and Adults have acted childish in regards to posting a recent petition to undermine the power of democracy.
